hero.title: The Architect in the Marketing Room
hero.subtitle: I design the story and the system—pairing creative strategy with architecture, automation and analytics. My work reduces operational drag, tightens attribution, and turns curiosity into conversion.

principles.title: Build for the System
principles.description: Strategy and architecture are inseparable. I design marketing programs that are not only creative but also technically sound, scalable, and deeply integrated with the entire business ecosystem.

principles.title: Translate Complexity
principles.description: My role is to bridge the gap between marketing, product, and engineering. I translate complex technical concepts into clear business value and marketing goals into actionable technical requirements.

principles.title: Measure What Matters
principles.description: Data is only useful if it drives decisions. I focus on building clean, reliable analytics pipelines that deliver actionable insights, not just vanity metrics, to measure impact and guide strategy.

principles.title: Automate for Impact
principles.description: I identify and automate repetitive, low-value tasks to free up teams for high-impact strategic work. This reduces operational drag, minimizes errors, and allows us to scale our efforts effectively.

testimonials.quote: Jacob is the rare marketer who is as comfortable in a strategy meeting as he is in a code editor. He transformed our data pipeline, giving us clarity we never had before. His work was a game-changer for our entire marketing function.
